name: Stellar Ghosts Settlers
storyline: You're part of a group of settlers who decided to go away from the corrupt galactic Government's yoke. The settlers decided to set their first colony on the recently discovered and uninhabited planet Prosopopia B-21, planet full of resources so that the colonists can thrive. Despite the hostile wild life the settlers managed to set multiple bases across the planet. Unfortunately it wasn't that long until the galactic Government found out about that treason and decided to invade the planet in order to get their hands on all those new resources.
summary: Stellar Ghosts Settlers is a Sci Fi Fantasy 3rd person action shooter game. Chose amongst 6 of the playable characters to go through the missions or the arenas. Kill as many enemies as you can to earn even more credits to update your favorite character(s).
